td.font: To be listed in the commencement program, participate in the graduation ceremony, and receive mail from the Alumni Association regarding commencement, students should ask their chairperson to approve this form no later than October 1st for December Commencement and no later than March 1st for May Commencement.

COMMENCEMENT MAILING: Check OneStart to ensure your address is up-to-date. The Office of the Registrar provides the Alumni Association with the name and address of each person who applied to participate in the Commencement.
(enter a "." if you don't have a middle name)
